name: SOUL HERO Inferno Wingman
text:
Must be Soul Summoned by banishing "Elemental HERO Flame Wingman" from your field and cannot be special by other ways. When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster in the Graveyard.
 This card can attack twice per Battle Phase.
